Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/08b9dbdabe5273be229e1c9e18c5d22a/tumblr_inline_nbtayiw56G1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>As revealed by Maxmaps on Squadcast, these parts have now connected to 0.25.</p>

Woot!

Gonna have so much fun.

OOOH shiny...

Looking good, SQUAD.

[Now please, moar images of that mystery structure?]
I'll be getting back into making large planes again.
Looking beautiful! I'm so glad you guys put cargo bays into 0.25. You will have my eternal thanks!
Awesome! Is there going to be a 2.5 adapter as well? (please say yes)
Also begging for a nosecone piece to make the inline cockpits more usable.

Looking beautiful! I'm so glad you guys put cargo bays into 0.25. You will have my eternal thanks!

I want them just as much as you, but I don't see any "cargo bays" there. Aren't those all adapters ?
So, what, three parts from the pack? Uh ... great, I guess?
hey guys i got a leaked image from next week's reveal. squad's probably gonna take it down so save it!

Awesome! Is there going to be a 2.5 adapter as well? (please say yes)

So much this. Must put spaceplane atop rocket. It's what Jeb would do.

Edited September 13, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

hey guys i got a leaked image from next week's reveal. Squad's probably gonna take it down so save it!

https://i.imgur.com/18sisb8.jpg

hahahahaha!

I normally disagree with regex's despondency regarding update leaks but...

Didn't we already know this? I'm not super well versed on Spaceplane + but these all look like things I'd expect from that to be in 0.25.

I normally disagree with regex's despondency regarding update leaks but...

Didn't we already know this? I'm not super well versed on Spaceplane + but these all look like things I'd expect from that to be in 0.25.

I can't see them releasing a handful of SP+ adaptor bits without also releasing the main fuselage and cockpit parts. They're all designed to work together, and the oval cross section makes them a bit of an awkward fit with existing parts. Half of a jigsaw ain't no use.

I can't see them releasing a handful of SP+ adaptor bits without also releasing the main fuselage and cockpit parts.

I can't either (and I can't wait for Porkjet's awesomeness to be immortalized in the game) but calling this a "reveal" is laughable.

I can't either (and I can't wait for Porkjet's awesomeness to be immortalized in the game) but calling this a "reveal" is laughable.

To be charitable, the "reveal" may be that "letting you know, we're about halfway through converting SP+ to stock".

To be charitable, the "reveal" may be that "letting you know, we're about halfway through converting SP+ to stock".

Three parts is a long way short of "halfway through converting SP+". Anyway, they should show us some more buildings and stuff, we all know what's in SP+.
show us the damn pool!

I can't either (and I can't wait for Porkjet's awesomeness to be immortalized in the game) but calling this a "reveal" is laughable.

Sorry it's not up to your own standards, regex, but it is indeed a reveal. The parts in their stock-integrated form are being unveiled little by little. You may know what's coming and you may know what they look like in the mod, but please consider those who don't and those who are excited to see them regardless.
Like the fact we get to see new parts as some of us play stock only. I don't want to get addicted to mods and have them die every update most of the time.
Well done! Even though this isn't really breaking news, it's certainly better than nothing!
woah, calm it down naysayers. I agree with the comment about playing stock because i hate mods breaking with every update, so anything new is extremely exciting. Good job squad, keep it up!

Sorry it's not up to your own standards, regex, but it is indeed a reveal. The parts in their stock-integrated form are being unveiled little by little. You may know what's coming and you may know what they look like in the mod, but please consider those who don't and those who are excited to see them regardless.

Man, they got you working overtime on a Friday night? Harsh realm...

You guys got some new pictures of the building?

Man, they got you working overtime on a Friday night? Harsh realm...

You guys got some new pictures of the building?

With time, regex. That WIP interior is the closest for now. Though on a semi-related note, the staff that works inside the building now has names. They'll be revealed later on, too.

Edited September 13, 2014 by Rowsdower

I'll be getting back into making large planes again.

Me too! I just hope there is an adapter for 2.5m parts... or maybe even MK3-3.57m! Ohhhhh that would make my planes so .... .............

Cant wait to do a remake of the tyrant:http://imgur.com/dJCFeMc

Edited September 13, 2014 by DundraL
